name: react-native
title: Environment Variables Template
description: Template for .env file with environment configuration
content:
# API Configuration
API_URL=http://localhost:8000/api/v1
API_TIMEOUT=10000

# App Configuration
APP_NAME=MyApp
APP_VERSION=1.0.0
APP_ENV=development

# Feature Flags
ENABLE_ANALYTICS=true
ENABLE_CRASH_REPORTING=true
ENABLE_DEBUG_MODE=true

# Third-party Services
# SENTRY_DSN=your_sentry_dsn_here
# GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ID=your_ga_id_here
# FIREBASE_API_KEY=your_firebase_key_here

# Auth Configuration
# AUTH_TOKEN_KEY=@myapp:auth_token
# REFRESH_TOKEN_KEY=@myapp:refresh_token

# Storage Configuration
STORAGE_PREFIX=@myapp:

# Development Settings
DEBUG_API_CALLS=true
DEBUG_NAVIGATION=false

# Platform-specific
# IOS_APP_ID=com.mycompany.myapp
# ANDROID_PACKAGE_NAME=com.mycompany.myapp
